pageBody.title: Hometown
pageBody.body: I was born and raised in Port Elizabeth. I loved growing up in PE, with its peaceful nature and atmosphere.

pageBody.title: Current Residence
pageBody.body: I moved to Cape Town in 2022, and have been staring at the mountain ever since. The beauty speaks for itself, and there is never a dull moment in the mother city.

pageBody.title: Physical Activities
pageBody.body: To keep the blood flowing, I enjoy weight lifting and indoor bouldering. I attempt running every then and again, but it's an uphill battle. Hikes are cool too :)

pageBody.title: Mental Stimulation
pageBody.body: I enjoy gaming with friends (CSGO and Dota, mainly), listening to music and reading books / blogs relating to my craft. I also love a good series.

pageBody.title: Tech Stacks
pageBody.body: Most of my experience involve the big three: JS, HTML and CSS. I also have experience with React and Angular. On the backend side, I have worked with Node, Spring, and a bit of .NET.  On the cloud side, I familiar with various AWS services.

pageBody.title: Practical Experience
pageBody.body: Maintaining and further developing one of South Africa's largest classifieds sites, with SEO and user experience being crucial aspects.
